description:
Elias recently moved this way, and once he realized he was in the neighborhood, he sent over an email with some pics and his interest in messing around with some of the ChaosMen team.
A lot was going on in the city (SXSW), so it was super nice to have someone who could just take a drive on over, and I could avoid the airport.
Elias spends a lot of time in the gym, but is also a young professional guy working in the medical field. Brawn and brains!
He seems pretty open to just about anything. Topping, bottoming, rimming, sucking cock. I get the vibe he is more of top, but flexible for the right guy.
What I love most about his solo video is he is very comfortable being in front of the camera, and you can tell he is certainly familiar with the solo format. His cum shot is pretty awesome too!
Will get him back soon for some oral action, and then see where it goes from there!
title: Elias - Solo
